text:
KBRA - Full Time / On-Site - Horsham, Pennsylvania (Outside Philadelphia)

We're looking for a lead web developer to join our team to run point on a number of greenfield projects in the financial sector. This position is focused on development with an expectation that you'll mentor other developers on your project team.

Our current systems run on PHP, JavaScript, jQuery, SQL Server, and MySQL.

You can reach out to me directly at jcampbell@kbra.com or check out https://www.krollbondratings.com/job/76 for more information.
